name: Reimu and Marisa's Wonderful Flight
description:
CONTROLS:

-Use arrow keys to move
-Z, Space, or Enter to advance dialogue

Art, Music, and Programming by Risemack! Made for Touhou Fan Game Jam 4.

This work is based on TOUHOU PROJECT created by ZUN.
